cast.name: 泰莉莎·帕尔墨 Teresa Palmer

this_title: A DISCOVERY OF WITCHES – HIDING IN PLAIN SIGHT
introduction: A handful of witches, vampires and daemons live unseen amongst humans. Teresa Palmer is brilliant academic Diana Bishop, a reluctant witch. Matthew Goode is geneticist Matthew Clairmont, a vampire. The VR invites participants to embody both Matthew and Diana’s story. You’ll discover other worldly powers you can control and others that dramatically control you and you’ll experience the first, highly charged meeting between the two.
chinese_title: A DISCOVERY OF WITCHES – HIDING IN PLAIN SIGHT
